NPC.name: wyvern
NPC.description: The bipedal protobird watches you, from slightly behind its toothsome jaws all the way to the tip of its long and trailing tail the wyvern is covered in long orange plumage above and downier fuzzy feathers along its underside. It seems remarkably fearless despite not really coming up to your knees.
